entry.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Internet perturbation
entry.content:
Sep 21, 21:08 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 21/09/2023 20:27 UTC
End time : 21/09/2023 20:58 UTC
Root cause : Related to the maintenance https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/y98h387ctq53
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 21, 21:03 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 21/09/2023 20:27 UTC
Service impact : We have an ongoing issue on 2 of our DNS servers (91.121.161.184 & 91.121.164.227), you may experience navigation difficulties.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Workaround : If you have a personal modem or a modem not manage by OVHcloud, We encourage you to use theses DNS servers : 91.121.61.147 / 87.98.149.171.
